TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IKeyboardInputSink

summary.span: 為元件提供鍵盤接收，這些元件會管理 Interop 界限中和 HWND 之間的定位鍵、快速鍵和助憶鍵 (Mnemonics)。

span.span: Provides a keyboard sink for components that manages tabbing, accelerators, and mnemonics across interop boundaries and between HWNDs.

summary.span: 這個介面實作 WPF-Win32 交互操作案例中的鍵盤訊息管理。

span.span: This interface implements keyboard message management in WPF-Win32 interoperation scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鍵盤接收器處理輸入之整體鍵盤輸入模型的特定子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，並可讓某些鍵盤輸入來處理，而且與目前的鍵盤焦點卻不被導向至 Hwnd。A keyboard sink handles input from particular subsets of the overall keyboard input model for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], and enables some keyboard input to be processed and directed to HWNDs other than the one with current keyboard focus. 如果您的元件包含其他元件，而且會維護定位順序，也必須實作自己的元件以及追蹤哪些元件具有焦點。If your component contains other components, and maintains a tab order, your component must also implement and keep track of which component has focus. 如需特別針對實作的輸入架構的討論[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]interop，請參閱[Windows Form 和 WPF 互通性輸入架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-interoperability-input-architecture.md)。For a discussion of the input architecture specifically implemented for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] interop, see [Windows Forms and WPF Interoperability Input Architecture](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-interoperability-input-architecture.md). 和每個實作介面，透過明確的介面定義。 and each implement the interface, through explicit interface definitions. 明確定義提供預設行為，也可以存取視透過介面的類型轉換或。The explicit definitions supply default behaviors, and can also be accessed if necessary through an interface cast of or .

MemberSignature.Value: public bool HasFocusWithin ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HasFocusWithin() cil managed
Public Function HasFocusWithin () As Boolean
public: bool HasFocusWithin();

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示接收或其包含的其中一個元件是否有焦點。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the sink or one of its contained components has focus.

returns.span: 如果接收或其包含的其中一個元件有焦點則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the sink or one of its contained components has focus; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是必要的轉送具有焦點的子元件的呼叫中實作。This method is necessary for forwarding calls to child components with focus from within the implementation. 呼叫直到您到達特定焦點和轉送的層級的遞迴那里。Call recursively until you reach the level of specific focus and forward there.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite KeyboardInputSite { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite KeyboardInputSite
Public Property KeyboardInputSite As IKeyboardInputSite

public: property System::Windows::Interop::IKeyboardInputSite ^ KeyboardInputSite { System::Windows::Interop::IKeyboardInputSite ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Interop::IKeyboardInputSite ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定對元件容器之 介面的參考。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to the component's container's interface.

value.span: 對容器之 介面的參考。

span.span: A reference to the container's interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性一開始應該設定為`null`。This property should initially be set to `null`. 將設定接收其元件將清單加入至任何容器呼叫任何其他方法，並可以設定多個時間後，之前。Any container that adds the sink to its components list will set before any other methods are called, and it can be set multiple times after that. 您應該將屬性設定為`null`處置前一次。You should set the property to `null` again before disposal.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool OnMnemonic (ref System.Windows.Interop.MSG msg, System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys modifiers);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnMnemonic(valuetype System.Windows.Interop.MSG& msg, valuetype System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys modifiers) cil managed
Public Function OnMnemonic (ByRef msg As MSG, modifiers As ModifierKeys) As Boolean
public: bool OnMnemonic(System::Windows::Interop::MSG % msg, System::Windows::Input::ModifierKeys modifiers);

param.name: msg
param.span: 助憶鍵及其相關聯資料的訊息。

span.span: The message for the mnemonic and associated data.

param.span: 請勿修改這個訊息結構。

span.span: Do not modify this message structure.

param.span: 參考僅基於效能考量而傳送它。

span.span: It is passed by reference for performance reasons only.
Modifier keys.

summary.span: 當叫用這個接收的其中一個助憶鍵 (便捷鍵 (Access Key)) 時呼叫。

span.span: Called when one of the mnemonics (access keys) for this sink is invoked.

returns.span: 如果已處理訊息，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the message was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)]訊息必須 WM_CHAR、 WM_SYSCHAR、 WM_DEADCHAR 或 WM_SYSDEADCHAR。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] message must be WM_CHAR, WM_SYSCHAR, WM_DEADCHAR or WM_SYSDEADCHAR. 如果元件有包含元件，必須傳遞訊息中包含的實作藉由呼叫每個元件的方法。If the component has contained components, the message must be passed in your implementation by calling each contained component's method. 傳回的介面`true`從不會呼叫。An interface that returns `true` from will not call . 實作可以選擇執行中處理所有特定組合並略過。Implementations can choose to perform all specific key combination handling in .and bypass .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite RegisterKeyboardInputSink (System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink sink);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite RegisterKeyboardInputSink(class System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink sink) cil managed
Public Function RegisterKeyboardInputSink (sink As IKeyboardInputSink) As IKeyboardInputSite
public: System::Windows::Interop::IKeyboardInputSite ^ RegisterKeyboardInputSink(System::Windows::Interop::IKeyboardInputSink ^ sink);

param.name: sink
param.span: 所包含之元件的 接收。

span.span: The sink of the contained component.

summary.span: 註冊所包含之元件的 介面。

span.span: Registers the interface of a contained component.

returns.span: 所包含之元件的 站台。

span.span: The site of the contained component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件和子元件應該維護站台的內部集合，並使用這個方法來新增新的接收並傳回新的站台。Components with child components should maintain internal collections of sites and use this method to add a new sink and return the new site. 您只需要維護的網站集合，因為接收可從此站台。You only need to maintain the site collection, because the sink can be obtained from the site.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TabInto (System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest request);

Public Function TabInto (request As TraversalRequest) As Boolean
public: bool TabInto(System::Windows::Input::TraversalRequest ^ request);

param.name: request
param.span: 指定是否應將焦點設定為第一個或最後一個定位停駐點。

span.span: Specifies whether focus should be set to the first or the last tab stop.

summary.span: 將焦點設定在接收的第一個定位停駐點 (Tab Stop) 或最後一個定位停駐點。

span.span: Sets focus on either the first tab stop or the last tab stop of the sink.

returns.span: 如果已依照要求設定焦點則為 ，如果沒有定位停駐點則為 。

span.span: if the focus has been set as requested; , if there are no tab stops.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和應該傳遞至這個方法中才相關值。 and are the only relevant values that should be passed to this method in the .

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TranslateAccelerator (ref System.Windows.Interop.MSG msg, System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys modifiers);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TranslateAccelerator(valuetype System.Windows.Interop.MSG& msg, valuetype System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys modifiers) cil managed
Public Function TranslateAccelerator (ByRef msg As MSG, modifiers As ModifierKeys) As Boolean
public: bool TranslateAccelerator(System::Windows::Interop::MSG % msg, System::Windows::Input::ModifierKeys modifiers);

param.name: msg

span.span: The message and associated data.
Do not modify this structure.

param.span: 參考僅基於效能考量而傳送它。

span.span: It is passed by reference for performance reasons only.
Modifier keys.

summary.span: 在 Keydown 訊息層級處理鍵盤輸入。

span.span: Processes keyboard input at the keydown message level.

returns.span: 如果訊息由方法實作處理則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the message was handled by the method implementation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks WM_KEYDOWN 或 WM_SYSKEYDOWN 訊息必須是。The message must either be WM_KEYDOWN or WM_SYSKEYDOWN. 如果元件無法處理輸入的翻譯，且有可能會有翻譯的子元件，它通常會呼叫上傳回結果之前會保存目前焦點所在的子元件的方法。If the component is unable to handle the input translations and has child components that might have translations, it typically calls method on the child component that holds the current focus before returning a result. 如果無法立即處理訊息，您可以重新分派它從實作中若有必要，，然後再回到`false`。If the message cannot be handled immediately, you can re-dispatch it from within the implementation if necessary, and then return `false`. 轉譯快速鍵的主要案例是處理 VK_TAB keydown 訊息和決定是否要將焦點在元件，來呼叫設子元件，或呼叫父站台上因為定位順序已達到開頭或結尾界限。A primary scenario for translating accelerator keys is handling the VK_TAB keydown message and determining whether to set focus within the component, to call to a child component, or to call on the parent site because the tab sequence has reached the beginning or end bounds. 某些元件可能會選擇處理 tab 鍵，以這種方式。Certain components may choose to not handle the tab key in this fashion.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TranslateChar (ref System.Windows.Interop.MSG msg, System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys modifiers);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TranslateChar(valuetype System.Windows.Interop.MSG& msg, valuetype System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys modifiers) cil managed
Public Function TranslateChar (ByRef msg As MSG, modifiers As ModifierKeys) As Boolean
public: bool TranslateChar(System::Windows::Interop::MSG % msg, System::Windows::Input::ModifierKeys modifiers);

param.name: msg

span.span: The message and associated data.
Do not modify this structure.

param.span: 參考僅基於效能考量而傳送它。

span.span: It is passed by reference for performance reasons only.
Modifier keys.

summary.span: 請先處理 WM_CHAR、WM_SYSCHAR、WM_DEADCHAR 和 WM_SYSDEADCHAR 輸入訊息，然後再呼叫 。

span.span: Processes WM_CHAR, WM_SYSCHAR, WM_DEADCHAR, and WM_SYSDEADCHAR input messages before is called.

returns.span: 如果已處理訊息則為 ，此時不應呼叫 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the message was processed and should not be called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您實作此方法以傳回`true`，不會呼叫輸入的架構該索引鍵的訊息。If you implement this method to return `true`, the input architecture will not call for that key message.
